title: [GAMEPLAY] Forecast Janna-Taunt Audio Glitch
body:
Whenever I press CTRL 1 and taunt as Forecast Janna I hear the Classic Janna taunt audio playing at the same time as the Forecast Janna taunt. This audio glitch happens _every single time_ I use CTRL 1 on Forecast Janna. This started happening when the new Taric rework was released to everyone.

Is this happening to anyone else?

replies.body: Known bug, we've had a Red respond to this one once or twice recently. They're on the job!
Thanks for the report! This should be resolved in 6.9. We are still working on audio theft if there is another Janna on the enemy team, but if you only have Forecast Janna in a game, it's fixed! :)
Yes, I noticed the glitch didn't happen with the update yesterday. Thanks!

how about the mastery taunt being under her health bar...the more and more i look thru old posts the madder im getting so stupid, mastery taunts have been out for 2 years since they hit pbe, and its not fixed sigh, audio is important to you guys but not visual heres a link to my bug report...with no response from any dev's http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/lE9PZa0q-jannasoraka-more-4-7-mastery-taunt-bug-gameplay
I also have the problem. Happened to Omega Squad Teemo also
